definition: to cover the whole (area)/to be found throughout
and even/to go so far as to
to make a name/to become famous
domestic and international/at home and abroad
to go everywhere/to scour (the whole town)
north and south sides of the Yangtze River (idiom)/(fig.) all over China
all over the world/everywhere/in all parts of the world
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
